sentences.cn: 统治阶级显然是存在的。

sentences.en: All the candidates won places on the ruling council.
sentences.cn: 所有候选人都在管理委员会赢得了席位。

sentences.en: Despite the ruling, Boreham was still found guilty.
sentences.cn: 尽管法庭先前已有裁决，博勒姆还是被判有罪。

sentences.en: Goodwin tried to have the court ruling over-turned.
sentences.cn: 古德温想推翻法院作出的裁决。

sentences.en: Goodwin tried to have the court ruling overturned.
sentences.cn: 古德温试图推翻法院的裁决。

sentences.en: He died in 1985 after ruling Albania with an iron fist for 40 years.
sentences.cn: 在以铁腕统治阿尔巴尼亚40年后，他于1985年去世。

sentences.en: She is expected soon to hand down a ruling.
sentences.cn: 估计她很快会宣布裁决结果。

sentences.en: That ruling comes as a blow to environmentalists.
sentences.cn: 那项裁决对环境保护论者来说如同一记闷棍。

sentences.en: That ruling had drawn sharp criticism from civil rights groups.
sentences.cn: 那项判决已遭到了民权组织的严厉批评。

sentences.en: The court will make its ruling on the case next week.
sentences.cn: 法庭下周将对本案件作出裁决。

sentences.en: The future of the island is bound up with the fortunes of the ruling power.
sentences.cn: 这个岛的前景与其掌权者的命运息息相关.
法官的判决是终审判决.

sentences.en: The reactionary ruling clique was torn by internal strife.
sentences.cn: 反动统治集团内部勾心斗角,四分五裂.

sentences.en: the ruling body of American golf
sentences.cn: 美国高尔夫球运动的管理机构

sentences.en: The ruling set a precedent for future libel cases.
sentences.cn: 这项裁决为今后的诽谤案提供了判例。

sentences.en: The two judges concurred on the ruling.
sentences.cn: 两名法官对这个判决意见一致.

sentences.en: Their ruling passion is that of carnal love.
We're anxiously awaiting the court's ruling on this matter.
sentences.cn: 我们正焦急地等待着法庭对此事的判决.

trans.tran_en: the ruling group in a country or organization is the group that controls it
an official decision, especially one made by a court
